msbt.message: Buongiorno!The name's . Glad to see I'm the first one using this campsite.
And you live on this island, don't you?<10_4 /> I figured. Yeah, I'm pretty good at reading people. I can even tell that you're really gonna enjoy having me here.
, this is so greatWhat makes it so great? Well, I'm glad I asked myself.It's the fun and the sun, the weather and the wind, the local , and the scene. It almost kinda makes me think about moving here
You should live here!
Move here!
, I've gotten really used to the lifeI don't even want to go home. And I have -thread count sheets on my bed there!
You should live here!
Move here!
I don't know, maybe I'm just imagining things, but I feel like everyone wants me to move here It's just this vibe, you know? Like when you can tell you're going to get the part in a car commercial.
You should live here!
Move here!

Wow. I'm honored. An exclusive invitation to an exclusive island for celebrities and entourages. There's just one little thing I'd hate for it to be so exclusive that it's justme. Can you go check with, like, the VIP manager of the whole island first? Just so I know this is legit.
Leave it to me!
Sure thing.
Guten tag! <10_4 />My fate is in your hands. Ha HA!

Have you talked to the executive producer about my role yet? I mean, about me moving here? While you get things settled, I'll just wait here and visualize my new lifeWhaddaya know? Even in my visualizations, I'm well-dressed

Hey, you!<10_4 /> So tell me Did I get the partof newest resident on this island?! I can see by the look in your eyes that you vouched for me with the higher ups, . For now I'll wait here and practice the look of surprise I'll have when you tell me you closed the deal!
I'm just sitting pretty until a certain deal goes throughCome straight here when you have news, OK?

Ahoy! That's a little bit of local flavor for you. It means, "What's up, !" You got good news for me, or what?Seriously?! You got me a personal red carpet AND my own VIP cabana?That's for "an invitation and my own place to live." Ha HA! Alright, now I've really got to get back to my home island and get my things in order Hasta la vista, !

There you are! I've just been waiting herepatientlyWho am I kidding? I need to know! Did you find me a place to live?<10_4 /> Oh. You did! That's cool. Really cool. In that case, I better head home and start packing. No big. I'm not totally excited or anything like that.
What's up, stranger? Are you one of the fabulous locals? The name's , and there's a good chance you'll have the good fortune of being my neighbor. Hope to see you around, . Ha HA!

I don't even live here yet, but I'm already thinking like a local.I can tell you where to get the best , and which beach has the best lighting for selfies. Yep, I think I'll have people call me "Cap'n ." How's it sound?
I feel like visiting this place has made me a new I'm more worldly, with a newfound appreciation for hard work.I even considered doing a little , can you believe it?
I'm a simple at heartI just want to be rich and make friends with all of the coolest and most beautiful folks around.
I've got something important to tell you, From now on, you'll be sharing with a certain fashionable . It's me! Ha. I guess I probably made that too easy for you to figure out.

I think it's time I took this whole camping thing to the next level. Permanent camping. Except, if I'm camping forever, I'll probably eventually want more of a structure, and some furniture Whoa. Has anyone ever tried that before?
Hey, spread the news! I'm moving to !Normally I'd produce a hype video or a press release, but I'm kinda roughing it right now.

Wow! is one hoppin' island, .Not that I mind. I love any and all opportunities I get to hand out my business card. It's embossed. That said, I hope we get a little one- on-one time after your company goes home. You know, just you and me.
